alert.note: Alert for Clayton (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 04 at 10:16PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Clayton and central Grant Counties through 1045 PM CDT... At 1016 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Balltown, or 12 miles southeast of Guttenberg, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lancaster, Fennimore, Cassville, Bloomington, Preston, Beetown, Mount Ida, Mount Hope, and North Buena Vista. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for northeastern Iowa...and southwestern Wisconsin.
